channel.title: Wordpress on Hugo中文文档
channel.description: Recent content in Wordpress on Hugo中文文档

item.description: Twenty Fourteen Twenty Fourteen is a responsive, two-column hugo theme based on the Wordpress theme of the same name. It features a dark color scheme and a left sidebar. Features A few features specific to this theme. Figure shortcode Example: {{% figure src="/images/snow.jpg" alt="A snowy day" caption="Snowy day" %}} Menu Put pages in the top navigation bar by adding menu=main in the page’s front matter. Author wordpressdotorg - https://wordpress.org/themes/twentyfourteen - https://themes.
